website_summaries.verdict: A quality floor lamp that offers ample lighting in a classy, sturdy design at a bargain price.
pros: Consumers love the solid base and adjustable angle of this living room floor lamp
It stands out for being lightweight yet sturdy, and its innovative design complements any room
cons: A few users reported issues with the packaging and construction

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this lamp
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this lamp. After trying and returning a number of lamps because they were poorly made (wobbly pole, top heavy and unstable) or too busy looking, we found our just-right lamp. It is everything the other five-star reviews stated: simple, solid, streamlined, good-looking and functional. We needed it to provide reading light to our window seat and sofa, and brighten up a dark room. Each light turns on independently and can be angled in any direction. One bit of advice, use warm toned bulbs if you don't want stark lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap = disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I spend thousands of dollars annually at Amazon and rarely return an item, but I really wish I had returned this lamp. The problem is cheap quality. Half the time a light doesn't come on, then magically it will come on by itself. The reverse has also happened with lights that initially came on, then died for no reason. I suspect there's a short in the electrical wiring, but who knows. I will throw it out and avoid buying products from this vendor going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind R. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was impossible to assemble! I've purchased many lamps of this type before and usually for about 25% of the price of this lamp. I've never had a problem with the assembly. However this time no matter how many times I tried to simply screw it together it was always crooked. The pre-drilled grooves were obviously not done correctly so the lamp was useless. It was a waste of my time but thankfully because I bought it from Amazon, it wasn't a waste of my money because I returned it. Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: R. Duval

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging, cheaply manufactured. Possibly opened and sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging I received looked as if it had been torn open, then taped back shut. Inside the pieces were stuffed every which way with some conforming to the styrofoam and some not. Thankfully I avoided cross threading any of the too thin threads putting it together until the very end. Then the top on cross threaded instantly. Oh well, the lamp doesn't tilt to one side too badly. However one of the switches does not work. At least it I broken in the on position. For the price I feel totally ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lincourt

customer_reviews.title: Works well Again
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Boston Harbor TL-Tree-134-BK-3L3-Light Adjustable Tree Lamp that I've purchased. It was very easy to assemble. It stands straight. The individual lights position easily. Keep in mind that it is a 60W per light tree lamp. This second lamp joins the first one that I bought in my effort to make my Zoom appearances clearer. Good lamp. Good price. The base is heavy enough to keep the lamp stable when I brush by it. I've only had it for a few days, but if its older companion is evidence, I expect reasonable service.
customer_reviews.author: C Jones

customer_reviews.title: When it's good, it works well
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the same model that though not fancy worked well in a corner of my not fancy sun room because the wire had been damaged. The replacement I got didn't screw together as it should. Instead it leans way off center in both directions and is not stable. When it's good, it works well. However, I might have been lucky the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Critic

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Super easy to put together, and has a lot of flexibility. I use this for my kitchen since there's currently faulty wiring in the overhead light. They light up the whole room really well.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: using it for decoration
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. Easy to put together. Works nicely. The turning of the dial to turn lights off & on is a little weird. I forget which direction does what. It's a little shorter than I would like but it's fine. It goes well with the look I'm going for in the room I placed it. I've attached pictures so you can get an idea of the height. I'm using Kasa LED wi-fi lights on there. They illuminate way more than 60 watts but use around that much power or less so it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: J. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy design to put together - if they'd only made it correctly!!!! The screws aren't machined all the way through so the lamp won't screw together tightly. Therefore it leans. If I take pliers to the screws to force it together, it mars the finish. Just make the darn thing right to begin with and we wouldn't have this problem. Unfortunately, I can't find a lamp that is consistently made correctly. This is the 3rd one of a different brand that is cheaply made and has problems out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Sikorski

customer_reviews.title: Definitely 5 star if the build quality is improved.
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely give 5 stars if the build quality is improved. Main issues: 1, The lamp cap mount design is VERY poor and loose. 2. One of the lamp twist support is VERY loose. 3. The switch quality is not very good, you can feel all 3 switch are not the same. 4. The light mount, switch and cap is not perfectly aliened together. Pros: 1. Good Material 2. Awesome overall design 3. Build quality of the bottom plate and tube is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 Lamps Worked, Replacment Works
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars being average, I give the lamp we received 2 stars as the second bulb socket intermittently works implying a quality issue. An exchange was requested. The two sockets that work are great and assembly was easy. Update 1/17/2020: The replacement works as expected. Kohl's return was pleasant (great store). Increasing review to 3 out of 5 for the replacement working.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: The lamp was great at first
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was great at first, but after a few months it started to lean off to the side. Then as each month went by it leaned more and more and more until if just fell over one day and all the light bulbs broke. I tried to twist the pole to tighten it so it would stand upright again, but that doesn't do anything. I turned it upside down and found a screw that you can tighten if you have an adjustable wrench and that solved the problem. Only buy this lamp if you want to have to re-tighten the screw on the bottom regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Typical cheap light tree
customer_reviews.text: This is your typical cheap light tree. It gets the job done and was cheap so not much to say otherwise. My only complaint is the actual switches on the back of each light are pretty flimsy and seem like they will break quickly. They are also sensitive towards being rotated too much/ not enough. I have this plugged into a wall switch though so I dont have to touch the knobs on the back of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Deserteagle

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this lamp again. It does provide light, and the lamps tilt and move so you can direct the light where you need it. But the base is flimsy and the pole stands crooked. When you adjust the lamp, it often comes loose from the bracket. If you want a cheap lamp, this might be the one!
customer_reviews.author: Carol O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: A great little "plant" light!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this little posable lamp so well that I ordered a second one. I have over 120 houseplants and I use these little lamps as "modified" grow lights. I use the "daylight" LED type bulbs in them and have found that they are every bit as good as a grow light, unless you are a professional grower and need a full spectrum lighting situation. Just a great little light!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handsome after three years
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find this metal floor lamp for our reading nook. Still loving it! None of the adjustments have gotten loose even after 3 years, and even though we aim the lamps differently fairly often, depending on whether we're reading or sewing and which chair we're sitting in. We keep the top one aimed to the ceiling to provide general room lighting, and with the LEDs we have in it, even my 6-ft-tall husband doesn't see the bare bulb. We use three different kinds of bulbs, all LED but different "warmth" and wattage for different tasks. Great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: D. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Spotlight not diffuser, doesn't light up room
customer_reviews.text: The shades of this floor-stander extend well past the bulb, so there is absolutely no diffusion from the sides of the shades. It serves as spotlight only, so practically speaking any light into a large room is from reflections off the wall. Plan to return and get another lamp with frosted, not opaque, shades.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: not well made
customer_reviews.text: it worked ok. but then it tipped into the wall and was permanently crooked. then it fell over onto the floor and the threading stripped. so now it is in the dumpster. im not asking for a indestructable lamp. i just ask it be less breakable than the light bulbs inside (the lightbulbs still work)
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: this is a piece of Asian junk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife this light for a christmas present and was terrific and she loved it. 2 years later I asked her to buy me one for my computer room. In just 2 years this light went from being a 5 star light to a 1 star. The reflector globes are constantly falling off and the switches are so cheap that one light doesn't even work. The lower light, it's switch sometimes works but what crap. How cheap can you be to not even use a switch that goes click like the first light.
customer_reviews.author: arrowpt 28

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp, especially rotatable lamp heads
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for two years and it's still like new. I use it every day. There's plenty of light and I love that the heads are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya  Kotov

customer_reviews.title: OK lamp
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's OK....The base is not heavy enough, but it would be expensive to ship if it were. The shades for each bulb are inserted and twisted to stay in place. They are not tight enough and if you bump the lamp they will fall out. You could fix this, however, with a little tape on the inside of the shade. For the price this is an OK product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: I’m thinking of purchasing another one. This type of lamp was hard to find.
customer_reviews.text: I had read previous reviews about this lamp and hesitated ordering it bc some complained that the packaging was poor, the contents were damaged/ defective and the lamp was not level and did not appear sturdy. However, when mine arrived, none of those complaints were evident as the packaging was intact, the contents fit perfectly during assembly and so far it is doing the job just fine. The on-off knobs could be a bit tighter and I hope they hold up ok, but otherwise this lamp was exactly what I was looking for compared to others I found that were of lesser quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I got this to modify to make a hanging light fixture, got something cheap so if I messed up it wouldn’t be too big a deal. Well my plan worked and this was the perfect product for it. So simple it’s easy to manipulate the construction any way you want
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Swivel lights on a short stalk
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture is not tall enough so when the lower 2 lights are on they shine into your eyes unless you are able to reflect them against a wall or ceiling in a way that always shines away from you. I tried them with regular round LED bulbs and LED floods and the floods are much better because they have a narrower beam and thus are less likely to shine in your eyes. Maybe they would be better in a kids room. Each light turns on independently with the switch being at the base of the bulb fixture, unlike other makes/models that have a single rotating switch on the pole that controls all the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Stosh

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smell
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received had no defects and was very easy to assemble. The problem I had with it was out-gassing from the "lamp shades" once I turned the lamp on. (I thought it might be the stickers insides the shades, but even after those were removed, the odor was awful.) Unfortunately this seems to often be an issue with lower-cost made-in-china stuff....
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I do not like how the lights light up the room
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose, which is to light up a room. I do not like how the lights light up the room. It seems like a pole with 3 different spotlights., When you have them pointing to the ceiling, the light is supposed to disperse and make the room become brighter. It doesn't quite do that. Also, I had a rough time putting it together. There was a ton of electrical wire going through the pole than what was actually needed and some. I struggled with putting it all in the pole.and putting the pole together.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but too costly for design vs quality.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled pretty easy and it works. But for 35 bucks on such a simple design I expected quality to be a bit better. The threads for the pole section were not smooth at all. The "knobs" on the back of each light are a plastic dome that do not have an even gap all the way around, they are tilted to one side. But it works for my purpose so I'm not too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JeremyTN

customer_reviews.title: Power Dial for the top lamp came broken 😡
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the box and found that the dial for the top light was cracked and broken off of the actual light luckily the lamp is already on when you plug it in otherwise I wouldn't have been able to use the product. Other than that issue very easy to assemble, You probably won't need the instructions included to do it because it's very very self-explanatory. The lamp heads are limited on how much they can move but they definitely cover everywhere you need in a bedroom, Had the lamp not come broken I would have definitely given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Ward

customer_reviews.title: A great price for a nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I put in three LED 60-W equivalent bulbs into this lamp and my studio is very well illuminated by this lamp. I really like the easy adjust-ability of each lamp shade. As I move each shade to a desired location, it stays in that new position with no finagling needed. Also, with these LED bulbs (~13-W), the lamp shades have never become too hot to touch. It was simple enough to put together and get up and running. I also really like how easy it is to turn on each light, and that each one can be turned on and off separately from the others. I'm personally very happy with this purchase. Such a great price for a nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: ivyxe

customer_reviews.title: Its very stylish and the lighting is F****** fantastic. I would strongly recomend this for any room
customer_reviews.text: Such a strong base. This lamp will not tip over. I was very impressed with the look. Its not a cheep looking IKEA light. Its very stylish and the lighting is F****** fantastic. I would strongly recomend this for any room. office bed room. living room. Great for light up paintings and art work. Really is my favorite light i have ever bought. The turn on and off with a knob that turns so easily. No more looking for a little switch or button for this. This is really my favorite lamp. On top of all that its pretty darn tall. like the perfect height tall.
customer_reviews.author: laurenbecker

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't give it less stars. However, two things are wrong with it. It is a hassle to figure out which way to turn it each time to turn the individual lights on or off' The bottom is very light weight and it will fall over if you breath too hard. You need to have something to keep it from falling over...like a table or end table. I didn't give it two stars because you do get what you pay for and this lamp was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Boston Harbor  3 tree lamp, black
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. I quilt a lot and these are a life saver. They throw out a lot of light over your shoulder or beside you when you are sewing. I would highly recommend these for any one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to assemble, but worth the time and effort.
customer_reviews.text: I can see why some people have ended-up with wobbly assemblies. The pole sections are poorly machined and difficult to screw together securely (I'm pretty handy and it took me an afternoon). I ended up using glycerin on the threads and a lot of re-positioning while turning each section onto the next (don't be gentle). If you see any silver between the pole sections, it's not together quite right, and it will end up being topsy-turvy and wobbly. But having said all this, when it's finally assembled correctly, this is a handy, sturdy piece. The manufacturer just needed to use a deeper gauge of thread in the fittings. But would I recommend it overall? Yes!
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Some Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: Received within estimated time of delivery. My only dismay with the purchase is that it must be assembled and that I should have realized when I bought it. Still, once I assembled my Boston Harbor TL-Tree floor lamp, my dismay resolved. It is a lovely addition to my living room, I can adjust the lighting to very bright by having all three lamps lit or softer for watching TV. I am very satisfied with my purchase and have recommended the lamp to my friends and family. Very much worth the few minutes it took me to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light at an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good lamp for a dark corner in my master bedroom. This floor standing light was perfect. Great price, fine quality and exactly what was expected. I would have to question the motivation of anyone that would not give this product a high rating.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Kipp

customer_reviews.title: ... shopped for lights on Amazon and my wife just loved this for a work tight work area in our ...
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for lights on Amazon and my wife just loved this for a work tight work area in our home. Now I have to buy two more for other areas in our home. Nice thing was out of the box I assembled without instructions (even thought they were their) We really like that this lamp is easy to positon each individual lamp in different positions. Works great in corners. We have 60W lamps and its no issue. Nice product and as always great to work with Amazon and Prime shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Mobile Guy

customer_reviews.title: great lamp, does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this light so much for my living room, I bought one for my dad's. It's pretty basic and not too flashy. I like that I can control how much light I need (1-3 bulbs on at a time). It's also nice I can aim them wherever I want. My lamp sits on carpet and it's very sturdy. It was super easy to put together. You just pull the cord through and the pole connects in a few different pieces. Then you just pop the cones for the bulbs in and voila!
customer_reviews.author: AA09

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than most!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous when I got this because my history with standing lamps is not good. I've had this lamp for about two or more years now, and it's survived three moves! The base is stable, and heavy enough that it doesn't fall over if you bump into it. Definitely great for the price, and would recommend 100x over anything in it's similar price range at walmart/target/ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Baylee Potter

customer_reviews.title: Lights our room well, without taking up space.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was easy to build, allows you to direct the light the way you want, and doesn't take up much space. It matches a lamp we got about 10 years ago (which is what we were looking for). Perfect for our 3 season room.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting at low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, delivered quickly, and exactly what I needed. Because the metal lamp shades are removable, I was able install 360 degrbut ee room illuminating special effects projecting lights in two of the sockets and a reading light with a shade in the third. It also has a relatively small heavy base which enabled me to put it in a narrow space behind my couch and not worry about it tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Claude L. Cornett Jr.

customer_reviews.title: this thing has been an excellent addition for my photography hobby
customer_reviews.text: this thing has been an excellent addition for my photography hobby, and all my other hobbies. i am able to adjust the light anywhere i want, the base is stable enough i don't have to worry about it tipping over. i'm so glad i got this, it was perfect for what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Caz Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice height, the knobs could be a better better
customer_reviews.text: Nice height, the knobs could be a better better. You can tell one of the knobs to turn the light on and off are off-center, looks like the way it got manufactured. Does not impair the lights function. Working great with the 3 LED bulbs that I got for it. Sometimes when I adjust the angle of the light the part that covers the bulb comes off and I have to put it back on again. Not really a problem, just wish there was a locking device to prevent this from happening. Good lamp overall.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Enlightening, sturdy, and fairly priced. A year later, I purchased another Boston Lamp. I assembled the lamp in 5 minutes. That's a personal record.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Glissadevil

customer_reviews.title: It's a standard lamp. Not too much to say ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a standard lamp. Not too much to say about it. I have it plugged into a remote control dimmer so I can use a remote to set the brightness. At max brightness it is more than enough for a medium sized bedroom. My only complaint is that the covers for the lights don't cut in quite enough. So if you aren't pointing all of the lights directly at the ceiling, then you will have the straight bulbs shining directly in your face.
customer_reviews.author: muldoon24

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy..reliable
customer_reviews.text: Have 2..one for reading and because it has great articulation..one for hobby work.. I take a section out to get the lights down to my head height..
customer_reviews.author: Red1

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, easy to install, thick metal
customer_reviews.text: I installed this without even looking at instructions. The metal is surprisingly heavy and thick. The pole is a little wobbly from the base and it comes unscrewed sort of easy but after you set it up and put it where you want, its no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kcup

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable lamp
customer_reviews.text: We now have three of these lamps, one in each bedroom and I’m thinking about getting another for my sewing room. Great lamp and can be adjusted to put the light where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: SATXLady

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.  Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a no frills floor standing light. This is all metal construction , 4-piece construction (base, 3 segments) and provides three lights. I put in some extra LED bulbs of different socket sizes without any issues (A21, PAR30 Short, A19, G20 ) The only thing I could think of to make this better is if each light had its own dimmer switch instead of On/Off that was remote controllable.... but that is probably asking a bit much for a $30 tree lamp. For the price, hard to go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Miwo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLOOR LAMP
customer_reviews.text: This floor lamp is extremely easy to put together!! Threading any metal part takes "ease" and "delicate" twisting so that it totally meets the other pole. Perfect fit can't even see where the parts are separated. Lamps are easy also the "snap" into place. Using FLB Soft white (2700°K) 60Watt Equivalent using only 13 watts is plenty of light!!! It's really worth it. All parts were packaged with great care & everything was emaculate. Very good buy/choice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Taking Amateur Photos
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just what I wanted to light up a small area for taking amateur photos. I didn't need any special lighting set up, just lights that could move around and cover certain areas and the moveable light heads allow me to do this. The lamp is easy to move around and let's off a good amount of light, I use Hyperikon HyperSelect 9W LED Light Bulb A19 bulbs. The lamp was easy to assemble in about 5 minutes without reading the instructions. It is good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the price. Arrived quickly and was very easy to assemble. Honestly it took longer to unbox and take all the plastic off. All the heads point wherever you need them and move well. The switches all work nicely... no crooked pieces... so far so good! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. Our house does not let in much natural light, and there is not enough overhead lighting in the house. I bought this mainly so I could read on winter evenings, when it is too cold and dark to sit outside and read. It was simple to assemble (just screw it together). It doesn't suit my personal taste, but yet is so simple, plain, and unobtrusive, it blends in very well with my decor. I'm glad I found this affordable lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great and haven't had any issues
customer_reviews.text: Many people complained that it was lopsided or didn't thread correctly. These people likely rushed it and ruined the threads before getting it in properly. It took about 10 minutes to assemble and works amazing with my 3 Phillips hue bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Base disintegrates, lamp falls over
customer_reviews.text: Base disintegrated after five years. The "cement" turned into a pile of dust and the lamp toppled over. It was used indoors, in an air conditioned room for the past five years and now it fell over and is dead.
customer_reviews.author: BB_Pompano

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later lights shut off sporadically
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 years - before the electrical isn’t working right and the lights started flickering on and off. Nice lamp, easy to put together and rotate the heads to shine light where needed. But after 2 years - I need to find a new lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Kristini

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good value lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy fixture, almost didn't expect it to be so well put together! Required some assembly and the globe bulb covers were a bit confusing to attach (I was afraid I'd break something off) but turns out they were literally a one snap to put on. I got this for my doves with use of a full spectrum bulb as the room doesn't get enough natural light. This works perfectly to angle the light towards their fluffy selves. If they're happy I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it, very versatile, light everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very versatile, light everywhere. Can flood heavy light into two rooms with this thing. This is the utilitarian light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Roberge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting with 100w LED equivalent soft white bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Great light for an excellent price! Put this in my son's Corvette room and it goes perfectly with the decor and I've placed 3 100w equivalent LED bulbs in soft white and it's really bright (I'm "allergic" to dim or low lighting). I'd even consider it for our master if I thought I could pull it off but alas no such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo

customer_reviews.title: My 18 year daughter loved it! It works great and she loves that ...
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year daughter loved it! It works great and she loves that she is able to swivel the lamp heads to shine the light in various directions or where needed. Easy assembly. Seems durable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ford

customer_reviews.title: Look for a Different Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is not a satisfactory product. Although described as black, it turned out to be white. The light it provides is limited due to the angles of the shades. Two new sixty watt bulbs, the proscribed wattage, burned out almost immediately. It is too awkward and heavy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin D. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Light was perfect for what we were doing
customer_reviews.text: Light was perfect for what we were doing we needed a light for the office. We are very happy with it what more can I say. The fact that I did not have to go out and search all over the world for it makes it even better. Went on Amazon and found it bought it it came I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: mazda

customer_reviews.title: A replacement was better, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Head to send one back as the threads on the poles wouldn't twist closed. A replacement was better, but not perfect; not worth returning. There is more light without the black "cups" over the lightbulbs. Basically so cheap, will work until I buy more stylish lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked taller but for what it is it's okay
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked taller but for what it is it's okay. One of the oversized turn knobs fell off like cheap glue about 2 months in. The other two have stayed. It's kind of loud to turn off and on when rotating the switch. It would have been nice to have a main switch for all three lights instead of having to turn each one off/on. I also would have liked more free range of motion on each lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sobe

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality lamp for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality lamp for a great price! I love how you can position the lights however you want. It helps put more focus on certain areas of the room or even shine down for a reading light.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Unstable lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is unable to stand straight. Feet under the base are uneven and the pole is bent.
customer_reviews.author: Coldoff

customer_reviews.title: Floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: This floor is exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great lamp, nice height, wonderful angles
customer_reviews.text: i love this lamp! i love the height and how easy it is to swivel the lights and turn each on and off. the only thing that bothers me is that you need to be careful turning the whole lamp as it can unscrew from the base VERY easily even if you have it screwed together as tight as it will go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: Light but not too lightweight. Takes about 30 seconds to put together. Works great. Lamps are all adjustable and all 3 can be on or off. I'm using pigtail bulbs & its very bright. Looks better than my $70 floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: MnMs

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but poor craftsmanship. The screws in the pole are off so it won't stay straight and is wobbly; we ended up using electrical tape to cover up the silver gap from the screws and to add more support. Shades are not secure and they fall out with the slightest touch. I would've returned it but it was needed promptly and matches the Boston Harbor desk lamp that was also purchased for the room.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Apartment gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandaughters firat apartment. She seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: tj52

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in manufacturing lowers the score
customer_reviews.text: Many people would have returned this. The rungs on the second to last piece were crooked and not fixable, so the top of the lamp looks like it is bent. Since I'm just putting it in the basement, I didn't really care. Other than that it was fine. Putting 3 100w equivalent fluorescent bulbs in provides a very nice amount of light in a previously dim area.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Really like this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my bedroom for years now. Works great anywhere and is super useful with the three moving lights. The structure itself is very lightweight, but still super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in 20 min. while my husband napped. Works great and I find no problem with the way you have to turn on each light. The lamps do not feel hot to the touch as someone else had commented on. Only thing I wish is that the bottom light could have been about 6" lower for ease in accessing the turn on switch - I have to pull the pole towards me while sitting in order to reach it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not attach to base properly
customer_reviews.text: The lamp would have merited 4 - 5 stars except for the fact that the section which attaches to the base had stripped screw threads and we had to use half a roll of duct tape to get it to stand mostly straight. I can’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service and Item
customer_reviews.text: Really simple and amazing. More than anything the company has been nothing short of understanding and patient with my delivery issues. Any other company could've told me that this was my responsibility but my experience ordering this item has been exceptional. The product itself is also very sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: great torch lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It has several fixtures on it and they're all adjustable. I have used a lot of torch lamp and in my opinion this one gives off the best flight out of all of the ones I have ever tried. I bought one of these a long time ago and it lasted for years, far as I know it still working. I gave it away and now got another one for myself. I intend on keeping this one I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Netty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This lamp fits my needs. It look nice, and I especially like the way the covers over the bulbs prevent light from coming through and distracting me while I work on my computer. The con: The lamp was in a thin factory box as the ones you see on a store shelf. The front of the box had a large gouge. I expected some damage to the lamp, but it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: mady

customer_reviews.title: If you blow a fuse at the light source the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you blow a fuse at the light source the lamp will fell you. If you are using the top lightbulb, and do not have a surge protector, when the surge happens the lamp will no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome simple design. Only con is you have to turn on every light, there isnt one switch for them all. Looks great and can adjust to aim the light anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy DeLancey

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp for a picture that hung in a relatively dark corner of our house. We only use one of the lamps to illuminate the picture perfectly. This is a great lamp for providing light in a corner wall area and for directing light on a needed table.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Kizzie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite of a new-lamp splurge in the darkest December
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of a new-lamp splurge in the darkest December. Fits in a small space near the outer part of a corner, is versatile for whatever I need on either side of that corner, is straight, is virtually invisible next to a small black table, is perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: J. Clinton

customer_reviews.title: It's stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I wanted! Was esay to assemble and arrived quickly, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Marv

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tri-Head Lamp - Ideal for Apartments and College Rooms
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pretty happy with the lamp, but there were a couple minor flaws that caused me to not give it a full five star rating. The threaded tubes were solidly built, but once fully assembled I noticed a slight bend. Nothing major, but not a perfect fit. Also, one of the lamp heads has a hard time staying in the position I put it. Other than that, it looks modern and chic in my home studio room :)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Good Tree Lamp
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I use CFL bulbs. Placed it behind my chair for reading. All 3 lights are turned on. Didn't want to have to keep reaching up and twisting cap to turn each light on/off, so I use Etekcity ZAP 2L Wireless Remote Control Outlet Light Switch to turn on and off. Base needs to be heavier. You may need to place a weight on base. It fell over once and broke ALL 3 bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: coeurdelion

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: My old lamp that i had for many years finally broke, this filled in perfectly along my recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S. Margita

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: My disabled husband can easily turn it on and off
customer_reviews.author: bernice leach

customer_reviews.title: Easy lamp and fit the best of any I have ever put together
customer_reviews.text: It fit together with no warped screw on threads. It was the fastest lamp I have ever put together. Years ago I ordered one on here that came in damaged because it didn't fit together properly. This I would advise anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Martin

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I should have measured beforehand. I thought it would be taller. It was very easy to assemble. Other than that it feels a little cheap but that matches what they're charging for it so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: JustHere

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp and another lamp from this store and this one worked when i plugged it in at home, then when i brought it to my new apartment it stopped working as soon as I plugged it in my new place.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: One shade cannot be put on because of the making ...
customer_reviews.text: One shade cannot be put on because of the making is not right, cannot fit in. Other parts are ok. The light's own box is way too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great finish and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Great finish and sturdy construction. The base is real heavy. Assembly took around 5 minutes and needs no instructions(though instructions are provided). For the price I could not find anything which come closer. And unlike others which are sold at homedepot these look much better. Working absolutely fine for over a month now. If you need a tree type lamp, this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: adi_vastava

customer_reviews.title: Base insert broke
customer_reviews.text: I owned this lamp for a few years, and although it looked nice initially, it had a habit of wobbling or appearing slanted. The lamp apparently decided to spontaneously collapse, leading me to the sign below of a broken insert. This definitely scared me a little, for I have not moved the lamp from its location often.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vu

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for lighting a room
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only complaint I have is that I am tall enough so that when I switch a light on or off, the light is at eye level for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gruundehn

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, adjusts well, works well, gets super hot
customer_reviews.text: This light was delivered well and worked perfectly. It very well lights a corner and I would definitely suggest it for someone. The lamps adjust well. The only negative is that it heats up enough where I am afraid to leave it on for longer than 2 hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Donn

customer_reviews.title: Wiggly Base / Broken Switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One has a wiggly base and the other one already has a broken knob/switch after 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Los Angeles Resident

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and quite well made for the price. Replaced a craft light and can't believe the improvement of this light. More and better light, nicer looking, and improves the style of my living room. Used the A19 LED lights and don't have to worry about replacing light bulbs for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of bulb size
customer_reviews.text: Went together very easily. Be aware that although the manufacturer recommends 60 watt bulbs maximum, the canisters get pretty hot using that bulb size. I changed to 40 watt bulbs and although it still gets warm, it does not get really hot.
customer_reviews.author: William Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this lamp its bright stands well and looks really nice Edit:It was broken in a place and I didn't realize it until someone pointed it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara0713

customer_reviews.title: Poor, very poor.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of this lamp. Parts did not go together correctlly. It would come apart before I got the next part together. I finally gave up and I was so upset that it went out in the trash. .
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very nice , very durable . It has metal lamp shades which I like and the base is nice and heavy so it is very supportive . It just screws together and put light bulbs in . Great buy , thanks Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: faith love

product_meta.title: Boston Harbor TL-TREE-134-BK-3L 3-Light Adjustable Tree Lamp, 60 W, A19
product_meta.description: Boston Harbor Tree Lamp, 3-Light, Adjustable, 60 W, A19 Bulb, Arbitrary Shape, Matte Black, Spot Beam, 45 deg Pivot, 350 deg Rotate Beam, 65 in Height, cULus Listed. Easy to assemble, complete instructions included. Spotlights rotate 350 degrees and pivot 45 degrees for optimum light placement. Individual on/off rotary switch for each light. Uses 3, 60-watt maximum a19 incandescent bulbs (not included). 65" overall height. Ul, culus listed.
feature_bullets: Boston harbor 3 light black tree lamp
Spotlights can rotate 350 degrees and pivot 45 degrees to shine light anywhere
Uses three 60 watt maximum a19 incandescent bulbs (sold separately)
3 spotlights can rotate 350 degrees and pivot 45 degrees to shine light anywhere
Uses three 60 watt maximum A19 incandescent bulbs (sold separately)
